sentences.en: Momma was cleaning inside, changing the bedclothes.
sentences.cn: 妈妈在里面清扫，换卧具。

sentences.en: Momma babbled on and on about how he was ruining me.
sentences.cn: 妈妈喋喋不休地数说他在如何毁我。

sentences.en: "That is beautiful, Tony," Momma said, no longer sounding at all snappish.
sentences.cn: “真美呀，托尼，”妈妈说道，话里的呵斥腔调不见了。
